sentences: Subal Das (26 December 1928 â€“ 16 August 2005) was a Bangladeshi music director and composer.
Das started working for the radio in 1963.
He died of cardiac arrest on 16 August 2005 at the Lifeline Hospital in Kolkata, India.
Das was married to Aporna Das (d. 1996).
Between 1948 and 1956, Das played football for Dhaka Azad Sporting Club.
